question: Hi I am asking for my husband.  He has type 2 diabetes,  Low Testoerone and has ED.  What my question is about, has to do with the base of his penis.  He has a deep ring indentation around the base, when this started it only went partially around, now it is a full circle.  This looks like he has been wearing a very tight band in this area, but of course he has not.What on earth could be causing this and what does it mean???Susie788
title: Penial Deformity
